data.message: It's about the message not the flow. I know its been awhile since a rapper hasn't mumbled on a track and sound like someone with down sydrome, but there was a time when it was about sending a message that ppl can Realate too.

replies.message: Exactly
People relate to proper grammar, and good spelling.
